body_html:
I don't think this is a 0.4.1 issue anymore because downgrading to 0.4.0 didn't entirely resolve it. I still see more memory warnings than yesterday even after downgrading. I'm a bit confused as to what is causing this since I also downgraded back to the cuda/cudnn. The one other thing I remembered I upgraded was the nvidia drivers, so I'll try to downgrade that next.

edit: Looking at the run it is still better than before just because it doesn't crash entirely. So 0.4.1/cuda 9.2 likely has some negative impact.

body:
I don't think this is a 0.4.1 issue anymore because downgrading to 0.4.0 didn't entirely resolve it. I still see more memory warnings than yesterday even after downgrading. I'm a bit confused as to what is causing this since I also downgraded back to the cuda/cudnn. The one other thing I remembered I upgraded was the nvidia drivers, so I'll try to downgrade that next.

edit: Looking at the run it is still better than before just because it doesn't crash entirely. So 0.4.1/cuda 9.2 likely has some negative impact.
